scripts.pkg:generate-prefab-bindings: node dist/index.js install docs.json --output prefab-src --cwd cli/gen-package
scripts.pkg:test-install: node dist/index.js src/Generate.elm --output engine --cwd cli/gen-package --debug --flags-from playground/docs/gql-docs.json
scripts.pkg:install-elm-json: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/json)
scripts.pkg:install-elm-core: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/core)
scripts.playground: (npm run build; node dist/index.js src/Gen.elm --debug --cwd playground)
scripts.playground-watch: (npm run build; node dist/index.js src/Gen.elm --debug --watch --cwd playground)
